tutorial.speak:
In B1, each group has a calendar of events.
Any group leader can add an event to their calendar by double clicking a date or clicking the "Add Event" button.
To add a basic event, just select the start and end times for the event, and give it a title and description. Then click "Save".
Group calendars can be included in a church-wide curated calendar which we'll cover in another video.
The "Private" toggle on the edit event page will prevent a specific event from showing up in these curated calendars.
You can make an event recurring by checking the recurring box and selecting how often it recurs.
For a quarterly meeting, select every 3 months, and select whether that is tied to a specific date, or day of the week.
Finally, set an end date if desired, or set it to never to keep the event recurring until it is deleted.
